}}In [[Middle-earth Role Playing]], '''Khâradûne''', also known as '''Hyarn''' or '''Hyarnustar'''<ref group="note">Not to be confused with [[Hyarnustar]] on the island of [[Númenor]]</ref>, was a coastal land south of [[Tulwang]] and north of the [[Dominions of the Seven]]. Khâradûne's northern border was formed by the Aronduin ([[Sindarin|S.]] "Woods-river").

While it was originally founded by the Adena, it was later colonized by [[Númenóreans]]. Wealthy mixed-blood descendants live near the coast, while pure Adena tend to live further inland. <ref>{{EndorMap|Hyarn}}</ref><ref>{{ICE|2026}}, p. 74</ref>

==History==
Ciryamir, father of [[Fifth of the Nazgûl|Akhôrahil]], landed in Khâradûne in {{SA|1904}} after being given a license to create a colony. He sailed up the Aronduin and founded [[Ciryatanor]] in the east.<ref name="nazgul">{{ICE|8003}}, pp. 84-86</ref>

The [[Army of the Southern Dragon]] began marching against Khâradûne and Ciryatanor in {{TA|1660}}, though the army was beaten back to Tulwang in {{TA|1675}}. The [[Far Harad|Sun Lord of Far Harad]] was defeated by Khâradûne's forces in {{TA|2643}} after a failed attack on the land.<ref name="timelinecitadel">{{ICE|8205}}, pp. 5-6</ref>
